text: allāhanu avana anugrahadinda tamage dayapālisiruvudaralli (sampattinalli) jipuṇate tōruvavaru, adu tam'ma pālige uttamavendu bhāvisadirali. Nijavāgi adu (jipuṇate) avara pālige keṭṭadāgide. Avaru jipuṇate tōrida ā sampattannu punarut'thāna dina horeyāgisi avara koraḷige kaṭṭalāguvudu. Ākāśagaḷa mattu bhūmiya antima oḍetanavu allāhanigē sēride mattu nīvu māḍuttiruva ellavannū allāhanu ballanu
